name: Plastic Tide
description:
By 2020, the global production of plastics will exceed 300 Million Tonnes and account for more than 8% of the worlds oil production. Plastics are now recognised as a major problem for marine animals in terms of ingesting or becoming entangled in plastics.

Plastic Tide is a VR experience that offers the perspective of a turtle as they venture throughout a reef system. 

The experience is meant to show the life of a turtle as they adapt to survive in their marine environment showcasing the reef structures and common hazards that might be seen in this environment.
